job.title: Data Cloud Engineer, Mid
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: ltstronggtJob Number R0113193ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtData Cloud Engineer MidltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtThe ChallengeltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAre you looking for an opportunity to develop a data platform that will have an impact on rapid exploitation and sharing of multiINT information across the intelligence community Solid platform development is a critical part of any programs success and you know how to do it right  scalable design with baked in security Thats why we need you a developer with the skills to build a platform that will transform the integrated intelligence missionltbrgtltbrgtAs a data platform developer on our team youll design and develop the core data integration platform for our project from end to end Youll work with customers and endusers to understand their mission current architecture and security requirements With a focus on the customers goals youll build a design that will scale to meet their evolving needs Your technical expertise will be vital as you recommend tools and capabilities based on your research of the current environment and new technology Your design will set the standard for future development so youll craft an architecture that smoothly works with existing infrastructure without compromising security As a technical leader youll identify new opportunities to build platformbased solutions to help your customers meet their toughest challenges This is a chance to use your deep OS knowledge and broaden your skill set into areas like Cloud computing largescale data ingestion and processing multiple data store types including graph data time series spatial and other NoSQL high performance data streaming data science and supporting the integration of novel mission applications and analytics Join us as we develop softwarebased solutions to make a difference for the integrated intelligence missionltbrgtltbrgtEmpower change with usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtYou Haveltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltligt4 years of experience with Java Spark Scala Hive or ETL engineeringltligtltligt2 years of experience with working in data ingestion processing and distributionltligtltligt1 years of experience in developing and deploying data ingestion processing and distribution systems on and with AWS technologiesltligtltligtExperience in working with IC data sets and NoSQL databases including ElasticSearch and HBaseltligtltligtExperience with using the following AWS datastores RDS Postgres S3 or DynamoDBltligtltligtExperience with processing big data with Spark Scala or MapReduceltligtltligtExperience with Agile software development practicesltligtltligtTop Secret clearance requiredltligtltligtBA or BS degreeltligtltligtAbility to obtain Security CE SSCP CCNASecurity or GSEC Certification within 6 months of hireltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtltugtNice If You Haveltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltligt2 years of experience with cognitive computing data integration data mining Natural Language Processing Hadoop platforms or automating machine learning componentsltligtltligt1 years of experience with data mining using current methods and toolsltligtltligtExperience with graph data stores time series database and other NoSQL technologiesltligtltligtKnowledge of one or more of the following Jira Git Kafka Kubernetes OpenShift OCP or DockerltligtltligtKnowledge of data science tools and their integration with big data storesltligtltligtKnowledge of data security policies and guidelinesltligtltligtTSSCI clearance with a polygraph preferredltligtltligtAWS CertificationltligtltligtSecurity CE SSCP CCNASecurity or GSEC CertificationltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtltugtClearanceltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtApplicants selected will be subject to a security investigation and may need to meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information Top Secret clearance is requiredltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtCompensationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe proposed salary range for this position in Colorado is 115000 to 120000 Final salary will be determined based on various factors At Booz Allen we celebrate your contributions provide you with opportunities and choice and support your total wellbeing Our comprehensive benefit offerings include healthcare retirement plan insurance programs commuter program employee assistance program paid and unpaid leave programs education assistance and childcare benefitsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBuild Your CareerltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtA challenging and dynamic work environment isnt all we have to offer When you join Booz Allen youll have access toltbrgtltulgtltligtexperts in virtually every training resources through our Digital University an online learning portal featuring more than 5000 functional and technical courses certifications and books Build your technical skills through handson training on the latest tools and tech from our inhouse experts Pursuing certifications that directly impact your role You may be able to take advantage of our tuition assistance onsite boot camps certification training academic programs vendor relationships and a network of professionals who can give you helpful tips Well help you develop the career you want as you chart your own course
